00035 class TrainerData{

00039             string pPosDelimiter = "/") : get_context(pGet_context),
00040             posDelimiter(pPosDelimiter){
00041         rareFreq_ = 1;
00042 
00043         cutoff_ = 10;

00045         evCutoff_ = 1;
00046 
00047         ctype_ = CMA_CType::instance(encType);
00048     }
00049 
00050     bool isRareWord(string& word){
00051         return wordFreq_[word] < rareFreq_;
00052     }
00053
